"New training at the Dragon Altar":
"Damned it, I have been tricked... I heard about
praying at the altar, and I thought that this is a
tourist vacation, but even for an altar, it is
known as a Dragon Altar? I have been suffering
everyday from the prayers. Did you mention to
defeat 70 dragorii species? It is dangerous and I
will sacrificed at the altar... I will take you geeks
as a reference for training and take revenge!
*Target dragorii species of Lv.61 and above,
at the Dragon Altar"

"くっそー、騙されたぜ……
祭壇でお参りと聞いて、てっきり観光休暇か
何かと思ったら、祭壇は祭壇でも龍祭壇って
言うんだぜ？　それも日頃苦しめられてる
お礼参りだってんだからシャレがキツいよ。
スーパーハードで龍族を７０体撃破だぜ？
危うくオレが祭壇に奉られそうになったけど
おたくを参考に修行してリベンジしてえよ！
※龍祭壇エリア限定
Lv.61～の龍族が対象"
